item.title: Nikon Launches Enhanced Microscope Portfolio
item.description: Nikon introduces new ECLIPSE microscope models to strengthen its industrial microscopy lineup.

item.title: Specim Unveils High-Speed NIR-SWIR Hyperspectral Camera for Industrial Machine Vision
item.description: Specim releases a high-speed hyperspectral camera covering NIR and SWIR ranges for advanced sorting and inspection.

item.title: Long-Life Cooled Thermal Cameras Deliver High-Speed High-Sensitivity MWIR Imaging
item.description: New cooled thermal cameras offer high-speed, high-sensitivity MWIR imaging for demanding industrial applications.

item.title: NanoFocus AG Becomes Wholly Owned Subsidiary of Mahr Group
item.description: Mahr Group acquires NanoFocus AG, consolidating its position in surface metrology and inspection.

item.title: Dance of the White Light Robots – A Closer Look at the Newest Inspection Technology in MRO
item.description: Automated white light scanning robots inspect turbine disks, enhancing precision and efficiency in MRO.

item.title: RobCo Raises $100M to Expand Physical AI–Driven Robotics Across Global Manufacturing
item.description: RobCo raises $100M to expand physical AI-driven robotics for flexible and intelligent manufacturing automation.

item.title: Medical Device Manufacturers Redefine Quality
item.description: Medical device manufacturers are transforming inspection processes and supplier management to meet new quality demands amidst digital and regulatory pressures.
